name: renrentong
description: The renrentong is a web application.
author: Seven Du <lovevipdsw@outlook.com>

scripts.watch: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --display-error-details --progress --colors --watch
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --display-error-details --progress --colors
scripts.build-dist: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --display-error-details --progress --colors
scripts.update-node_modules: npm update --save amazeui-touch babel-core babel-loader babel-plugin-transform-object-assign babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-0 cross-env css-loader extract-text-webpack-plugin fastclick file-loader html-webpack-plugin node-sass postcss-loader react react-addons-css-transition-group react-dom react-dropzone react-redux react-router redux redux-thunk sass-loader style-loader superagent trash-cli url-loader webpack react-pull-to-refresh
